full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/6/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE+ IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE DUPLICATE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA 395297 (To accompany monthly report on Form N-4) PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION No. To the Honorable U. S. District Massachusetts Boston The Courtept 316(a) at This petition for naturalization, hereby made and filed under accident Gina Wong 01 Immigration and Nationality Act, respectfully shows: (1) My full, true, and correct name is 34D Paul Plac Boston Mass. 02118 (2) My present place of residence is (Apt.No.) (Number and street) (City or town) Sept. 20, 1910 Cantony Toysun, China (ZIP Code) (3) I was born on in (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (County. district. province. of State) (Country) (4) I am married, and have living children. Feb. 13 55 (5) I was lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence on 19 and have not abandoned such residence. China 10 017 891 (6) My present nationality is ALIEN REGISTRATION NO. (7) I have not heretofore made a petition for naturalization. (no change requested) (8) I pray that my name be changed to female, medium, brown, black, 5' 2", 127 1bs., none. (continued over) AFFIDAVIT OF WITNESSES The following witness each being severally duly, and respectively sworn, depose and say: Harry W. 01 (1) My name is 34D Paul Place, Boston, Mass. I reside at and Sam Lau... (City or town) (State) (2) My name is 257 Shawmut Ave., Boston, Mass. I reside at (Number and street) (City or town) (State) I am a citizen of the United States of America: I have personally known and have been acquainted in the United States with the petitioner named in the petition for naturalization of which this affidavit is a part, since at least 2/1/71 ; to my personal knowledge, based upon (Month) (Day) (Year) frequent observations and personal contacts with the petitioner within the State(s) of residence of the petitioner since said date, the petitioner has resided, imme- diately preceding the date of filing this pesition, in the United States continuously since the date last mentioned; that the petitioner has been physically present 31 in the United States for at least months of that period; and that petitioner has been a resident in the State in which the petition is filed during at least the last 6 months. I have personal knowledge that the petitioner is, and during all such periods has been a person of good moral character, attached to the principles of the Constitution of the United States, and well disposed to the good order and happiness of the United States, and in my opinion the petitioner is in every way quali- fied to be admitted a citizen of the United States. I do swear (affirm) that the statements of fact I have made in the affidavit to this petition for naturalization subscribed by me are true to the best of my knowledge and belief: so HELP ME GOD. Harry (Signature Wong of M itness) oi Sam Lau (Signature of Witness) WHEN OATH ADMINISTERED BY CLERK OR DEPUTY WHEN OATH ADMINISTERED BY DESIGNATED EXAMINER CLERK OF COURT Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me by above-named peti- Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me -named peti- tioner and witnesses in the respective forms of oath shown in said petition tioner and witnesses in the respective forms of oat in said petition and affidavit. and filed by said petitioner. in the office of the clerk of said and affidavit at this Boston, Mass. court at day of A.D. 19 3rd this day of February A.D. 19 76 Designated Examiner. George F. McGrath I HEREBY CERTIFY That the foregoing petition for na uralization was by petitioner named herein filed in the office of the clerk of said court By Origina Sprier Deputy Clerk. Clerk. at this day of A.D. 19 [SEAL] Clerk. By Deputy Clerk. Form N-405 (Rev. 7-1-70) gs
